benchmark_details.name: CS4 (Comparing the Skill of Creating Stories by Controlling the Synthesized Constraint Specificity)
benchmark_details.overview: CS4 provides a novel benchmark dataset with varying levels of prompt specificity to measure the creativity of large language models (LLMs) in story writing without human annotations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the creativity of large language models in story writing under varying levels of constraints.

data.source: Dataset consists of 50 user instructions and corresponding human-written reference stories.
data.annotation: Constraints are synthesized using GPT-4 and evaluated for satisfaction.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the ratio of constraints satisfied and a combination of normalized coherence scores.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate better adherence to constraints and higher creative output.
methodology.validation: Metrics validated against outputs from multiple LLMs.
